posts.content:
does anyone know of a decent trimmer / interior company anywhere near leeds? the oily bits on the bus are nearly done now and i need to find someone who ideally can do both the trimming and the wooden bits of the interior etc not a million miles from where i live..... the van is in kennilworth so i really just want to find somewhere thats at least on the way to me from kennilworth....

cheers
Richard Booth for woodwork, and Kens customs for trimming. Not to far from Kenilworth.
cheers, have already spoked to those guys unfortunately they have no slots till september which is too far away i think

Kevin Jackson ...but you know of him. He will make interior panels and Interior wood work to your requirements.
He will fit you in!
G

he's in shropshire now graham..... ideally i want to send to where i can get them done at the same time so that i dont have to continue to ferry the van about etc...... you back from bonnie scotland yet?

Indeed he is! You or he could get a set of Interior panel, cab seat covers if you need and a set of cushions from J&S?
Fitted by Kevin with his interior?
LHD WT?
Remember you had headlining fitted.. but cannot remember are
Cab seats covered?
Any Interior panels?
Any clear shopping list?
